## Challenges Setup
# Cloudera Manager server:

### db.properties file


```
-rw------- 1 cloudera-scm cloudera-scm  433 Jul  6 10:45 db.properties
[root@ip-172-31-4-194 cloudera-scm-server]# cat db.properties
# Auto-generated by scm_prepare_database.sh on Thu Jul  6 10:45:59 EDT 2017
#
# For information describing how to configure the Cloudera Manager Server
# to connect to databases, see the "Cloudera Manager Installation Guide."
#
com.cloudera.cmf.db.type=mysql
com.cloudera.cmf.db.host=localhost
com.cloudera.cmf.db.name=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.user=scm
com.cloudera.cmf.db.setupType=EXTERNAL
com.cloudera.cmf.db.password=scm_password
[root@ip-172-31-4-194 cloudera-scm-server]# 
```
